item.description:
After further research on this Meet Up,
I am changing the Java Jive Meet Up
To a Starbucks Meet Up in North Haven on Washington Avenue.

http://www.starbucks....

www.starbucks.com/Retail/Find/storedetails.aspx?sid=62421&coords=06516|41.291787120809|-72.93827162743248|10&undefined=1

Please note the location and time change.
I change the time to 2:00 to allow members to
Complete their early Sunday morning activities.
Please change your RSVP if necessary.

This Starbucks is right off I 91 Exit 12..
It is right next to CVS Pharmacy.

It is in a small shopping area, the stores from left to right;
Liberty Bank, AT & T, Quiznos Sub, Vague Nail Spa 2 and
Then Starbucks.

There are many more stores and restaurants on Rte 5
In North Haven in case we want to go some where
Else after we get some coffee.

As always, weather permitting.
If there is a heavy snow or ice storm on this Meet Up day,
Then for the safety of the members the Meet Up will be
Cancelled.

Best Holiday Wishes to all in Coffee Talk
Mike B
Assistant Organizer for Coffee Talk
item.how_to_find_us: Members see our photos in the website. Starbucks is a very small cafe so it will be easy to see us.
item.why: Great Coffee, Great Company and Great Conversation.
item.name: Starbucks Coffee on Rt 5 in North Haven
